channel.title: Orientation to the Audacity Interface
channel.description: Dr. Robert R. Saum's Orientation to the Audacity Interface.
channel.itunes:author: Dr. Robert R. Saum
channel.itunes:keywords: audacity, audio, editing, podcast, education, multimedia, dbcc, teaching, learning, authoring

item.title: Orientation to the Audacity Interface
item.itunes:author: Dr. Robert R. Saum
item.itunes:summary: This module prepares users for further instruction in the use of Audacity by familiarizing them with the interface layout, tools, and controls. Upon completion, users should be able to recognize and select the appropriate parts of the interface when asked.
